description: Slop-sloppy-joe! What kid doesn't enjoy getting a little messy.
alt: Chris Farley dancing to the sloppy joe song by Adam Sandler

description: Give your kid's creativity free range when they decorate their own dinner.
alt: Personalized pizzas using the toppings to make faces

description: Make something delicious, healthy, and fun. What can beat that?!
alt: Frozen yogurt bites in the shapes of unicorns on top of a cutting board

description: With Glitter Grapes, or Sour Patch Grapes you may find yourself never returning to store bought candy again.
